item.description:
**Please note the location change for this event. It will now take place at the Longfellow Club in Wayland. We will meet at the indoor basketball court.**

Join us for some kicks & fun. This event gives budding soccer stars from 2-7 years old a familiar framework in which they can excel. It begins with a welcome, incorporating a song for the younger age groups (ages 2– 5) and a cheer for the older ages (Kindergarten and up). The classes kick off with stimulating warm-up games followed by a muscle-warming stretch to get everyone ready for action. With RSVP, please confirm your kid's age(s).
item.name: Kids PM Activity: Super Soccer Stars
